extensionName.message: Sokuji - AI-powered Live Speech Translation for Online Meetings

extensionDescription.message: AI-powered instant speech translation for all video meetings. Break language barriers with real-time voice translation.

clickToStart.message: Click "Open Sokuji" below to start real-time translation.

quickStartInstructions.message: Configure your API key (OpenAI or Gemini) → Select "Sokuji_Virtual_Mic" as microphone → Start speaking!

currentlyOn.message: Currently on $HOSTNAME$. Sokuji works on these platforms:

refreshAndTry.message: Please refresh the page and try again.

gatherTownGuidance.message: Pentru a folosi Sokuji, selectați "Sokuji Virtual Microphone" în setările microfonului dvs.

wherebyGuidance.message: Pentru a utiliza Sokuji, vă rugăm să selectați "Sokuji Virtual Microphone" în setările microfonului și să dezactivați reducerea zgomotului pentru performanțe mai bune.

defaultGuidance.message: To use Sokuji, please select "Sokuji Virtual Microphone" in your microphone settings.

discordGuidance.message: To use Sokuji, please select "Sokuji Virtual Microphone" in your microphone settings and disable Noise Suppression in Discord's Voice settings for better performance.
